title: Schema for DENO_PERMISSION_BROKER_PATH
description: The schema of a single line of the DENO_PERMISSION_BROKER_PATH response.

id.description: The numeric ID of the request this is a response to.

result.description: The result of the check, tells Deno if the request should be granted or rejected

reason.description: Optional message to display to the user on deny. This will override the default error message text.
